FuncDef: This command configures a match criteria for theoriginattribute. Originally, theoriginattribute was applicable only to BGP as a mandatory well-known BGP attribute.
CLIs: origin { igp | egp | incomplete | any | aaa | dynamic | static | bonding }

ParaDef.Info: Configures matching path information originating within the local AS.
Configures matching path information originating in another AS.
Configures matching path information learned by another method.

Specifies to use the subscriber host address originated from AAA. Values-IPv4 - subscriber-management  /32 host routes that are originated from the RADIUS framed-ip-address VSA other than 255.255.255.254. The 255.255.255.254 returned by the RADIUS indicates that the BNG (NAS) should assign an IP address from its own pool..

Specifies to use the subscriber host address originated from DHCP, DHCPv6, or the local address server. Values-IPv4 - subscriber-management /32 host routes that originate from the DHCP server (local or remote) or RADIUS framed-ip-address=255.255.255.254 (RFC 2865)..

Specifies to use the subscriber host address originated from the local user database. Values-IPv4 - subscriber-management /32 host routes that are originated from the LUDB. This should also cover the RADIUS fallback category (RADIUS falls back to system defaults or to the LUDB)..
